title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Senior Social Innovation Challenge—Simulation-Based Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and introductory understanding of social innovation concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can identify three real-world problems in aging societies and define them as challenges through VR simulations.
Learners can collaboratively develop one problem-solving prototype applying design thinking and lean startup methodologies.
Learners can concretely present social value creation potential and execution plans (timeline, resource allocation) in the final presentation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
